events.message: The customer reported a vehicle accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving a collision with another car at an intersection during heavy rain.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision and accident circumstances.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim promptly to ensure proper follow-up and assistance.
The insured party received an acknowledgment email confirming the receipt and initiation of the accident claim process.
The claims team requested submission of photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and witness statements to proceed with the investigation.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documentation including photos, the official police accident report, and contact details for witnesses.
Investigation began to verify details of the collision, assess vehicle damage, and confirm the liability based on the submitted evidence and reports.
The claims adjuster completed the investigation finding the insured party not at fault and damage estimates validated by the repair shop.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured customer covering full repair costs and additional compensation for rental car expenses during vehicle repair.
The insured customer expressed satisfaction with the timely processing and clarity of the settlement proposal after reviewing all terms.
The claim approval was finalized following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured customer without any disputes.
The indemnity payment was issued to the repair facility and the insured customer's rental car vendor to cover all approved claim costs.
The claim was officially closed after confirming that all payments were made and the customer had no further concerns or follow-ups.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived securely in the insurer's system for future reference as necessary.
